body.name: Air Purifiers for Home Large Room up to 1740sq.ft, LUNINO H13 HEPA Air Filter with PM 2.5 Display Air Quality Sensors, Aromatherapy Function, Air Cleaner for Dust, Smoke, Dander, Pets Hair, Pollen
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 39 mins
features: 【High Efficiency HEPA Air Purifier】LUNINO H13 HEPA air purifiers for home can effectively captures 99.97% of airborne contaminants, including pet hair, smoke, PM 2.5 and bad smells. This large room air purifiers coverage area up to 1740 sq ft, fits in different spaces like bedrooms, living rooms, offices, nurseries, basements and kitchens. It is the best choice for anyone who wants to improve air quality.

【5 Fan Modes & Night Light】LUNINO air purifier for home has 5 fan speed mode (Sleep/Auto/Low/Med/High), you can adjust fan speeds according to your needs to achieve the best effect. Sleep mode is very quiet and the noise as low as 15dB, let you enjoy fresh air as you sleep sweetly. The soft night light can prevents falls and can be turned off for a perfect night's sleep.

【Aromatherapy & Child Lock】Add a few drops of your favorite essential oil to the aromatherapy pad on top of the air purifier for home to give a room a pleasant scent or mask a bad odor. The considerate child lock design can prevent your baby from being injured and prevent accidental touching and arbitrary changes in settings.

【Air Quality Display & 4 Timer Function】Hepa air purifiers for home feature a air quality sensor and displays real-time PM2.5 levels on the air purifiers display screen. Timer function is conveniently adjusted between 2, 4, 8 or 12 hours and good for energy saving. Note: The air purifier is in the preheating state after power on, and the indicator light will continue to flash for one minute. So you don’t need to worry as this is normal.

【Filter Replacement Reminder】This air purifier for large room has a filter replacement reminder function. When the filter reaches the end of its service life, the filter replacement indicator light will light up to remind you that the filter needs to be replaced. We recommend replacing the filter every 3-6 months and using the official LUNINO filter to ensure optimum performance. (The official replacement filter can be purchased on Amazon by searching B0CMC2HHZH)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars meet my expectations, recommend.
reviews.reviewText: In my living room, the large air purifier stands as a silent guardian, its High Efficiency HEPA filtration system working tirelessly. What truly sets it apart for me is the sleep mode – so quiet that I often forget it's there. On evenings when the mood strikes, I drop my favorite lavender essential oil onto the aromatherapy pad. The scent it wafts through the room is subtle yet transformative, turning my living space into a haven of relaxation. The air quality display and timer functions are straightforward, making operation a breeze. This air purifier, with its blend of functionality and sensory enhancement, has enriched my home life significantly. I find myself more at ease, enjoying cleaner air and the tailored ambiance it creates. For anyone looking to enhance their living environment, this air purifier is a worthy consideration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My significant other before this product was blowing his nose every morning and so congested. Now that is no longer the case. Who would have thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good air purifier to improve air quality
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier does not take up much space as its dimensions are 6.26 inches deep x 11.77 inches wide x 16.14 inches high. Therefore, it is ideal for large rooms such as living rooms or bedrooms, more depending on which room is based on necessity.It does aromatherapy and has a night light function so even at midnight you can still see where it is and it's still running. Plus, the purifier operates quietly and won't interfere with your night's sleep or your daytime reading. Three fan speeds can be selected according to your needs, and automatic mode means you don't have to always press a button to control it.Additionally, the four timer options are thoughtfully designed so you can set a timer without worrying about forgetting to turn it off and causing it to keep running.Although I can't see the allergenic ingredients with my own eyes. HEPA filters capture allergies, pet hair, smoke, pollen in the bedroom, providing air quality for healthier living and easier breathing.A good air purifier to improve air quality seems like a no-brainer to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh air with delightful aroma
reviews.reviewText: My home's living room needed an air purifier because I noticed an increase in dust and snow salt powder lately. I ordered this air purifier two weeks ago, and it has exceeded my expectations. I believe it's the best air purifier I've ever used, featuring many functions I hadn't seen before. The purifier has a display showing its operational status, including a PM2.5 level indicator in different colors representing air quality. With high purification efficiency, it can purify a space of 240 cubic meters within an hour, covering a large room of up to 1740 square feet. Placed in my living room, after about three hours, returning home felt like entering a new house with incredibly fresh air. What I enjoy most is its aromatherapy function, a feature I hadn't experienced before. While purifying the air, it releases a pleasant fragrance, filling the living room with aroma in about 30 minutes – far more effective than scented candles or diffusers. Our entire family appreciates it for allowing us to live in an environment that is both fresh and fragrant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The air quality in winter is always a concern, and how to improve indoor air quality is a question that every family must consider. Fortunately I have solved this problem very well. This air purifier uses H13 HEPA air filter, which can effectively filter dust, smoke, dog hair and pollen. A high-quality filter can purify an indoor area of 1740 sq ft. One filter is enough to purify the air in my entire apartment. Its control screen can display the detection value of PM 2.5, allowing me to try to understand the indoor air quality. Its working noise is very small, especially in sleep mode, it is only 15 decibels, which is almost negligible. Air purifiers are a must-have item in the home and play an important role in health that cannot be ignored. You won’t be disappointed if you choose this air purifier, it’s great value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition for home!
reviews.reviewText: The experience of using this air purifier is really impressive. First of all, it is excellent in filtering odors and particulate matter, which is especially suitable for my house(we have a cat and a dog). Pet hair and odors are much reduced in the air, creating a fresher indoor environment.I especially like it's aromatherapy function. By adding my favorite essential oils, the room is full of pleasant aromas. This not only improves the air quality, but also adds a pleasant atmosphere to my home environment.At the same time, its children's lock design brings me an extra sense of peace of mind. This design can not only prevent children's accidental operation, but also make me feel more at ease. Overall, this air purifier is nice addition for my family, providing us with fresh and safe indoor air. I'm satisfied with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breath of Fresh Air
reviews.reviewText: My house is 1500 square feet, and this air purifier is suitable for large family rooms under 1740 square feet, making it a perfect fit for my house. Concerned about the dryness caused by winter heating leading to itchy skin, I purchased the LUNINO H13 HEPA Air Filter. It features a PM 2.5 display air quality sensor, allows for the addition of fragrance, and has an aromatherapy function. This air purifier effectively removes dust, smoke, dander, pet hair, and pollen. It's easy to use with a simple plug-and-play setup, and I've placed it next to the exit aisles of several rooms. Since using it, my skin no longer feels itchy, and the discomfort is gone. Additionally, my nose no longer experiences frequent nighttime bleeding due to dryness. I am highly satisfied with its performance.
